img_above_text:
![Wukong Sandgate 58.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/18/Wukong_Sandgate_58.jpg)
His new charge attack has a jumping slam that will create a ring fissures all around him, which you’ll need to get away from rather than trying to counter.
img_below_text:
His overhead slam can similarly raise a line of fissures from the strike, making dodging to the side your best bet.
![Wukong Sandgate 61.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Wukong_Sandgate_61.jpg)

content.text:

            - Following Text: "His overhead slam can similarly raise a line of fissures from the strike, making dodging to the side your best bet.
![Wukong Sandgate 61.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/0/01/Wukong_Sandgate_61.jpg)"

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game "Black Myth: Wukong," showing a character named the "Second Rat Prince" executing a powerful attack. The attack creates a ring of fissures on the ground, indicating a high-impact move that players need to evade. The context suggests that this is part of a combat sequence where strategic dodging is crucial to avoid damage from the enemy's powerful strikes.
